title: How to Defeat the Clockwork Soldiers in Luigi's Mansion

steps.headline: Go to the clockwork room.
steps.description: In order to go here, you need a key from the cellar. The door to the clockwork room is in the telephone room, at the very right.

steps.headline: Find the clockwork soldiers there.
steps.description: In order to summon them, you need to turn on all the clocks in the room.

steps.headline: After they come to life, notice the winds on their backs.
steps.description: You will need to use the poltergust in order to unwind it. Once one of their winds fall off, their heart is exposed. Use your poltergust to suck them up and capture them.

steps.headline: Once you capture all of them, access the elevator.
steps.description: Use this to go to the roof.

text: Go to the clockwork room. In order to go here, you need a key from the cellar. The door to the clockwork room is in the telephone room, at the very right. Find the clockwork soldiers there. In order to summon them, you need to turn on all the clocks in the room. After they come to life, notice the winds on their backs. You will need to use the poltergust in order to unwind it. Once one of their winds fall off, their heart is exposed. Use your poltergust to suck them up and capture them. Once you capture all of them, access the elevator. Use this to go to the roof.
